extendedInfo.description: Log your life and Go!SaveThisDate is a mobile application for on-the-fly recording of important events and occurrences of your life. No need to catalogue or use complex classifiers. Just type in a quick description, set an optional reminder and thatâs it. FAST ENTRYIn a few seconds, you can store many details of your life that, day after day and without any effort, will grow exponentially into a massive database of your lifeâs most important events. SEARCHSearching for a past occurrence will become a breeze as all your important life details will be at your fingertips. Just enter a simple keyword and the search function will rapidly retrieve all the associated records of your log.NOTIFICATIONSYou can define an alert to occur at a specific date and give you a instant notification about a certain event or occurrence stored in the log.SECURITYAll your data can be backed up to your SD card or any compatible storage and be restored in a simple step.PORTABILITYExport your data to CSV format so that you can easily use it on other third-party applications such as spreadsheets.SHAREShare your day by day life with your friends via SMS, email, Facebook, twitter, etc...
